parameters.query:
SELECT
  mo.origin_url,
  mb.file_id
FROM (SELECT $1::uuid AS workspace_id, $2::text AS blob_ref) req
LEFT JOIN public.media_origin mo
  ON mo.workspace_id = req.workspace_id
 AND mo.blob_ref = req.blob_ref
LEFT JOIN public.media_blobs mb
  ON mb.workspace_id = req.workspace_id
 AND mb.blob_ref = req.blob_ref
 AND mb.provider = 'telegram'
LIMIT 1;

WITH updates AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF(entry.workspace_id, '')::uuid AS workspace_id,
    NULLIF(entry.blob_ref, '') AS blob_ref,
    NULLIF(entry.file_id, '') AS file_id
  FROM jsonb_to_recordset(COALESCE(NULLIF($1::text, ''), '[]')::jsonb) AS entry(
    workspace_id text,
    blob_ref text,
    file_id text
  )
),
upserted AS (
  INSERT INTO public.media_blobs (
    workspace_id,
    blob_ref,
    provider,
    file_id,
    meta,
    created_at,
    updated_at
  )
  SELECT
    u.workspace_id,
    u.blob_ref,
    'telegram',
    u.file_id,
    '{}'::jsonb,
    now(),
    now()
  FROM updates u
  WHERE u.workspace_id IS NOT NULL
    AND u.blob_ref IS NOT NULL
    AND u.file_id IS NOT NULL
  ON CONFLICT (workspace_id, blob_ref, provider)
  DO UPDATE SET
    file_id = EXCLUDED.file_id,
    updated_at = now()
)
SELECT COALESCE($2::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb) AS result_json;

WITH refs AS (
  SELECT jsonb_array_elements_text(COALESCE(NULLIF($2::text, ''), '[]')::jsonb) AS blob_ref
),
rows AS (
  SELECT mb.blob_ref, mb.file_id
  FROM public.media_blobs mb
  JOIN refs r
    ON r.blob_ref = mb.blob_ref
  WHERE mb.workspace_id = NULLIF($1::text, '')::uuid
    AND mb.provider = 'telegram'
    AND COALESCE(mb.file_id, '') <> ''
    AND (mb.expires_at IS NULL OR mb.expires_at > now())
)
SELECT COALESCE(jsonb_object_agg(rows.blob_ref, rows.file_id), '{}'::jsonb) AS cache_map
FROM rows;
